all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For since the beginning of the world have not men heard nor perceived by the ear, neither hath any eye seen, O God, besides thee, how great things thou hast prepared for him that waiteth for thee.
Doctrine and Covenants 133:45
Quote of the Day
"In our daily lives, we can choose to do the things that invite the Lord’s Spirit to come into and dwell in our hearts."
Elder Christopher H. Kim | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
